name: Beatdown Breakdown Boomtastic
description:
Hit those beats HARD! You've been hired as a security guard at a concert, and it's your job to protect the DJ from unruly fans rushing the stage to drag him away. Finish the song to win; fail to protect the DJ and you'll get booed offstage.

Power up your punches by lining them up with the beat of the DJ's music. You help him, he helps you back-- stronger together!

Controls:

  • Keyboard:  "WASD" to move, "Space" to jump, "Left-click" to attack, "Esc" to quit.
  • Controller:  D-pad/L-stick to move, "B" to jump, "A" to attack.
